title: Eric Dobbs
synopsis: Turtle graphics enthusiast and systems adventurer.

title: First Dancing Turtle
synopsis: We have built a proof of concept to experiment with turtle instructions scraped from wiki paragraphs. These lyrics are modified from a song to get a few more move instructions into the mix. [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=inHwBUo9Pzk youtube]

title: Tortoise Explains the Dance
synopsis: We turn to a story about the code behind our [[First Dancing Turtle]] and how words on the page inspire it to move.

title: Turtle Experiments
synopsis: We finally connect turtle geometry to wiki.

title: Welcome Visitors
synopsis: Welcome to this [[Federated Wiki]] site. From this page you can find who we are and what we do. New sites provide this information and then claim the site as their own. You will need your own site to participate.
